name: Apodrakosis Ascension Gate of Dinocrag
desc:
You can only control 1 "Apodrakosis Ascension Gate of Dinocrag". "Apodrakosis" monsters you control gain 300 ATK. "Apodrakosis" Pendulum Monsters, and Level 10 or higher monsters whose original Type is Dinosaur, you control gain this effect.
● Once per turn, when the effect of a monster on the field with less ATK than this card is activated (Quick Effect): You can place 1 face-up "Apodrakosis" Continuous Spell you control on the bottom of the Deck; negate the activation.
